name: Blaster Force (prototype)
description:
Blaster Force was inspired by retro 80s aesthetics and arcade gameplay, futurized for 2020! 

This is a very early prototype, made with Unity. It includes models and animations, vfx, music, and other assets from the Unity Asset Store. I plan to expand on this game in the future, adding many more features, visuals, music, enemies, and player characters. 

Special thanks to the Unity Create With Code Live course creators and instructors, and to the Las Vegas Unity Users Meetup Group.
